fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Constructive contibution towards policy devleopment in the fields of WINE CMO, ALCOHOL & HEALTH, CONSUMER INFORMATION, MARKET ACCESS (MINT & COMEX), ENVIRONMENT and INNOVATION
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Direct membership of national wine & spirit Associations and Organisations: 
- ACIBEV - Wine & Spirit Association of Portugal (PT) 
- AEVP - Association of Port Wine Shippers (PT) 
- ADVID - Association for the development of Douro Vineyards (PT) 
- PORVID - Association for the protection of vine diversity (PT) 
- CNOIV - National Committee of OIV (International Organisation of Vine & Wine)(PT) 
- Forum Nacional de Alcool e Saude (PT) 
- FEV - Federacion Española del Vino (Madrid) 
- Wine in Moderation - Art de Vivre (WIM) Aisbl (Brussels) 
 
Indirect participation in EU Federations (via National organisations) in : 
- CEEV - Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins 
- spiritsEUROPE 
- FIVS
goals__remit: To be the Iberian reference of quality wines, of family tradition, focused on developing relevant brands for consumers in priority markets.
relevant_communication:
1) Active contributor as Ambassador Company of European Wine social responsibility program WINE IN MODERATION, aimed at reducing alcohol related harm within the guidelines of the EU Alcohol & Health Strategy 
2) Leadership in Online consumer Information for alergens, vegetarian, vegan  and calories for complete product portfolio (https://infoconsumidor.sograpevinhos.com/en)
